dataIdInfo.idAbs: Optimizing spatial sampling using the Surface Tortoise algoritm. Grid sampling and random stratified sampling are also available.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: International Center for Tropical Agriculture - CIAT

param.name: aoi
param.dialogReference: SpatialPolygonsDataframe delineating the area to be sampled. The coordinate system shall be the same as for the rasters. If not completely overlapping, the itersection of x1 and y will be sampled.
param.pythonReference: SpatialPolygonsDataframe delineating the area to be sampled. The coordinate system shall be the same as for the rasters. If not completely overlapping, the itersection of x1 and y will be sampled.

param.name: soil_raster
param.dialogReference: Raster layer. Additionally four raster layers (x2, x3, x4 and x5) can be used. These will be transferred to the same extent and resulution as x1. All rasters will be centered and scaled. The first principal component of the rasters will be used as the surface for wich to optimize the sampling.
param.pythonReference: Raster layer. Additionally four raster layers (x2, x3, x4 and x5) can be used. These will be transferred to the same extent and resulution as x1. All rasters will be centered and scaled. The first principal component of the rasters will be used as the surface for wich to optimize the sampling.

param.name: sampling_method
param.dialogReference: Sampling algorithm: 'dir' = directed (SurfaceTortoise algorithm), 'stratdir' = stratified directed (SurfaceTortoise algorithm), 'grid' = regular grid and 'stratrand' = random stratified.
param.pythonReference: Sampling algorithm: 'dir' = directed (SurfaceTortoise algorithm), 'stratdir' = stratified directed (SurfaceTortoise algorithm), 'grid' = regular grid and 'stratrand' = random stratified.

param.name: strat_size
param.dialogReference: Cell side (metre) of a square staratification grid
param.pythonReference: Cell side (metre) of a square staratification grid

param.name: min_dist
param.dialogReference: Minimum distance allowed between samples. Valid for the 'dir' and the 'stratdir' methods.
param.pythonReference: Minimum distance allowed between samples. Valid for the 'dir' and the 'stratdir' methods.

param.name: edge
param.dialogReference: Buffer zone (metre) inside the sample area border, where sampling is prohibited.
param.pythonReference: Buffer zone (metre) inside the sample area border, where sampling is prohibited.

param.name: stop_dens
param.dialogReference: A stopping criterium. No more samples will be added when this number of samples per stratum has been reached. Valid for 'stratdir' and 'stratrand' methods.
param.pythonReference: A stopping criterium. No more samples will be added when this number of samples per stratum has been reached. Valid for 'stratdir' and 'stratrand' methods.
